name: Moon Dragon Demo
description:
You look trough your old collection of Commodore 64 Games. But this game called Moon Dragon confuses you as you dont remember playing it or owning it.

You shrug it off saying to yourself:It was probably really long ago so thats why i dont remember it.
You plug in your Commodore 64 and boot the game up....

Controls:

Jump-z

Cam right-c

Cam down-Down Arrow
